metadata.title: CVE-2022-43750 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
drivers/usb/mon/mon_bin.c in usbmon in the Linux kernel before 5.19.15 and6.x before 6.0.1 allows a user-space client to corrupt the monitor'sinternal memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-43750` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.1.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.1.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.1.0-14.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.2.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1003.3
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.2.0-1004.5
No subscription required
